thread.title: Food price fall could save families £305 a year once we’re free from single market says former Environment Secretary
thread.title_full: Food price fall could save families £305 a year once we’re free from single market says former Environment Secretary

author: iwarnes3
title: Food price fall could save families £305 a year once we’re free from single market says former Environment Secretary
text:
Opinion BREGGSIT Food price fall could save families £305 a year once we’re free from single market says former Environment Secretary 
The ex-Cabinet Minister said hard-pressed families could save £305 per year when Britain has its own seat at World Trade Organisation negotiations BY LYNN DAVIDSON, Whitehall Correspondent 17th February 2017, 12:16 am
